author: vlimant
body:
#### PR description:

what we intend to put in this PR is a cleanup of the nano configuration:

- [ ] - drop support of old mini input (drop<=10.2.X)
- [ ] - include module validation through fillDescription
- [ ] - safer cloning mechanism ( https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/39337#pullrequestreview-1129548158 )
- [ ] - normalizing of modifiers syntax ( #39342 )

#### PR validation:

no change of output is expected

`runTheMatrix.py --what nano --site "" --command "--number 10"` is the standard candle.

cms-bot nano validation using https://github.com/cms-sw/cms-bot/pull/1867 would be great.
title: NANO configuration Cleanup [WIP]
